Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rainy \Rain"y\ (r[=a]n"[y^]), a. [AS. regenig.] Abounding with rain; wet; showery; as, rainy weather; a rainy day or season. [1913 Webster]

rainy adj 1: (of weather) wet by periods of rain; "showery weather"; "rainy days" [syn: {showery}] 2: marked by rain; "their vacation turned out to be a series of rainy days" [syn: {pluvial}, {pluvious}] [also: {rainiest}, {rainier}]
